```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

load(file = "abalone_clean.RData")
```

This is a quick summary statistics table for the cleaned abalone dataset.

```{r results="asis"}
library(arsenal)
tab1 <- tableby(adult ~ sex + length,
                data = abalone_clean)
summary(tab1, pfootnote = TRUE)
```

Here is another table of the dimension measurements.

```{r results="asis"}
tab1 <- tableby(adult ~ length + diameter + height,
                data = abalone_clean)
summary(tab1, pfootnote = TRUE)
```
